tool.name: metabat2
tool.description: Metagenome Binning based on Abundance and Tetranucleotide frequency
tool.command: metabat2 --inFile $in_file --outFile './bin' #if $abd_file --abdFile $abd_file #end if --minContig $min_contig --maxP $max_p --minS $min_s --pTNF $ptnf #if $noAdd $noAdd #end if --minCV $min_cv --minCVSum $min_cv_sum --minClsSize $min_cls_size --numThreads 8 #if $onlyLabel $onlyLabel #end if #if $saveCls $saveCls --noBinOut #end if --seed $seed #if $debug $debug #end if --verbose > $log

param.name: abd_file
param.label: A file having mean and variance of base coverage depth
param.help: (tab delimited the first column should be contig names, and the first row will be considered as the header and be skipped) (Optional)

param.name: min_contig
param.label: Minimum size of a contig for binning (should be >=1500)

param.name: max_p
param.label: Percentage of 'good' contigs considered for binning decided by connection among contigs

param.name: min_s
param.label: Minimum score of a edge for binning (should be between 1 and 99)

param.name: maxEdges
param.label: Maximum number of edges per node.

param.name: ptnf
param.label: TNF probability cutoff for building TNF graph
param.help: Use it to skip the preparation step

param.label: Turning off additional binning for lost or small contigs

param.name: min_cv
param.label: Minimum mean coverage of a contig in each library for binning

param.name: min_cv_sum
param.label: Minimum total effective mean coverage of a contig (sum of depth over minCV) for binning

param.name: min_cls_size
param.label: Minimum size of a bin as the output
Output only sequence labels as a list in a column without sequences
Save cluster memberships as a matrix format

tool.help:
MetaBAT: Metagenome Binning based on Abundance and Tetranucleotide frequency
Documentation can be found at `<https://bitbucket.org/berkeleylab/metabat>`_.
